proposed fix

This patch is a proposed fix

Applied patch and ran debug test, jdi tests, and eval tests, which all passed.

Fixes the issue of having a CCE, and maintains the use of JDINullValue for primitive types.
Verified the CCE is fixed. I wish we had a test case for this, as it indicates an inner class is trying to access it's enclosing "this" instance, which is null. I'm not sure how that happens.
